Instruction: Preheat your oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Grease an 8x8-inch baking dish.

Combine the oats, flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. In a separate large bowl, mix the butter, vanilla, buttermilk, and Guinness. Blend the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients until well combined. Pour the batter into the greased baking pan, and optionally top with more oats.

Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, then reduce the temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and bake for another 30 minutes. Turn off the oven, leave the door ajar, and let the bread cool in the oven for 30 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack.
